Platinum Mobile Spa


What We Offer

Massage

A few massage techniques are employed to give your muscles and body full relaxation. With these you will be relieved of tension, which will add to your physical, emotional, and mental improvement.

Skin

Facial treatments are used to clean, vitalize and restore your skin. Through proper use of facial treatment methods, you will feel relaxed and refreshed with a new glow.

Nails

Ususally the hands and feet are the forgotten heroes of our day to day activities. This treatment is to help restore both hands and feet using the proper ingredients. Everyhting is done with attention to detail and with the focus of cuticle, nail, and skin health.

Would you like to book an appointment?

Platinum Mobile Spa offers well-qualified therapists, skilled in massages, nail treatment, and facial treatment. Each service is curated to your specific needs. We look to help you feel your best for affordable prices.
